pageProduct.name: Vierra Forest Supreme Essence 8*50ml Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Glycation refers to the process in which sugar in your bloodstream attaches to proteins. This process, amongst other things, can cause your skin to look dull and lifeless and cause blemishes. Glycation can also trigger inflammation. Your daily shot of Forrest Supreme Essence is packed with high concentrate superfood extract of Pomegranate, Red Wine Essence, Blackcurrant, Golden Berrtm Aronia, Amla, Grapeseed & precious Charentais Melon to provide the antioxidant, anti-glycation and skin plumping properties for brightening skin.  

Anti-glycation:
Pomegranate extract provide an excellent source of ellagic acid and antioxidants such as flavonoids and proanthocyanidins. These nutrients allow for our skin to combat problems such as glycation, age lines, wrinkles, blemishes, breakouts, inflammation and so much more.
Resveratrol helps protect skin's surface, interrupts and helps rebuff negative environmental influences such as glycation damages, and brightens a tired-looking complexion. It also has significant skin-calming properties that may help minimize the look of redness.

Ingredients

Pomegranate Extract 2000mg, Red Wine Essence (Resveratrol) 1000mg, Golden Berry Extract 1000mg, Black Currant Extract 1000mg, Dark Sweet Cherry Extract 1000mg, Apple Juice Concentrate, Aronia Fruite Extract, Amla Fruite Extract, Citric Acid, Charentais Melon Extract, Blueberry Flavour, Sucralose

Directions

Adult-one serve a day. For the best results, drink in the morning after food. Dilute with up to 250ml of chilled water or sparkling water. Stir until completely mixed.
